Trigger.name: Vortex Pulling
Trigger.script: send("pilot steer e") wm.aether.beast = true wm.aether.target = matches[2] send("shipt target " ..wm.aether.target)

regexCodeList.string: ^Drawn by the flux of energy, an? \w+ (\w+) suddenly wanders into the nearby area\.$
^Drawn by the flux of energy, a six-headed (scyllus) suddenly wanders into the nearby area\.$
Drawn by the flux of energy
The energy vortex flashes and a vortex karibidean flies out of it.

Trigger.name: Beast dies
Trigger.script: if wm.aether.autopilot then wm.aether.automove() if PilotSiphon then enableTrigger("Pilot_Siphon") end disableTimer("pilotSiphon_timer") end

Trigger.name: Shockwave released
Trigger.script: wm.aether.shockwave = false if wm.aether.autopilot then wm.aether.automove() end

regexCodeList.string: ^With a ripple, .+ frees itself from its shockwave\.$
I am clearing the command chair of all impairments\."$

Trigger.name: low reserves
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) < 50 then send("pilot funnel 10 energy from collectors") end

regexCodeList.string: The command chair whirrs quietly, ready to be used once again.

Trigger.name: Beast Enter
Trigger.script: wm.aether.beast = true wm.aether.automove() if PilotSiphon then disableTrigger("Pilot_Siphon") end disableTimer("pilotSiphon_timer")

regexCodeList.string: enters from the \w+ on the aetherways\.$

Trigger.name: being shadowed
Trigger.script: shadowed = true wm.note("Being shadowed by "..matches[2]..", maneuver to escape")

regexCodeList.string: ^.+ \[(\w+)\] shadows the movements of .+ \[\w+\], preventing her from moving away\.$
I have been infested by an aetheretic slivven!

Trigger.name: EmpathStartUp
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == "chair" then wm.aether.empath.table.chair[1] = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "orb" then wm.aether.empath.table.orb[1] = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "grid" then wm.aether.empath.table.grid[1] = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "cube" then wm.aether.empath.table.cube[1] = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "turret" then turrCount = turrCount + 1 wm.aether.empath.table.turrets[turrCount] = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "collector" then collCount = collCount + 1 wm.aether.empath.table.collectors[collCount] = matches[3] end

regexCodeList.string: The empathic grid whirrs quietly, ready to be used once again.
concussive shock rips through the hull\.$
shreds deep rends through her hull\.$
^Violet sparks fly through the air and
cries out as bolts of jagged energy strike out from the ruptured fabric of aetherspace here\.$

Trigger.name: slivven check occupied Module
Trigger.script: send("shipt slivven detected at "..matches[3].." at "..matches[2]) slivvenFound = slivvenFound + 1

Trigger.name: slivven check unoccupied
Trigger.script: send("shipt slivven detected at unoccupied "..matches[2]) slivvenFound = slivvenFound + 1

Trigger.name: Kill slivvenCheck
Trigger.script: if slivvenFound == 0 then send("shipt no slivven detected") else send("shipt "..slivvenFound.." slivven detected.") end disableTrigger("slivvenCheck") setTriggerStayOpen("slivvenCheck", 0)

regexCodeList.string: I am clearing the command chair of all impairments\."$
A battle turret is not targeting anything.
A battle turret whirrs quietly, ready to be used once again.
Exhaustion clouds your mind and you fail to properly link to a battle turret.

Trigger.name: Turret Off
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("turret_module") send("shipt My turret is now deactivated")

Trigger.name: Turret Off Targetted
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == wm.name then send("shipt My turret is now deactivated") disableTrigger("turret_module") end

Trigger.name: Rupture
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == wm.name then send("turret rupture") end

Trigger.name: targetted shockwave
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == wm.name then send("turret shockwave") end

Trigger.name: Action_Repeat
Trigger.script: if position=="murkle" then send("turret murkle") elseif position=="strip" then send("turret strip") elseif position=="worble" then send("turret worble") elseif position=="clarionblast" then send("turret clarionblast") end

regexCodeList.string: ^A battle turret whirrs quietly\, ready to be used once again\.$

Trigger.name: Auto Fire (Normal Gunning - All Turrets)
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("turret_module") enableTrigger("Turret_Auto") acsdisplay("AUTOMATIC FIRE - <green>ENABLED") send ("turret fire")

Trigger.name: Set Position
Trigger.script: if matches[3]== wm.name then position=matches[4] acsdisplay("Position set to - "..matches[4]..".") send("shipt Turret set to "..matches[4]) end

Trigger.name: Murkle
Trigger.script: if matches[3]== wm.name then send("turret murkle") end send("shipt Their "..moduletar.." has been murkled!")

Trigger.name: Wurble
Trigger.script: if matches[3]== wm.name then send("turret worble") end send("shipt Their "..moduletar.." has been worbled!")

Trigger.name: ClarionBlast
Trigger.script: if matches[3]== wm.name then send("turret clarionblast") end send("shipt Their "..moduletar.." has been BLASTED!")

Trigger.name: Strip
Trigger.script: if matches[3]== wm.name then send("turret strip") end send ("shipt Their shields are down!")

Trigger.name: Target Ship
Trigger.script: shiptar=matches[3] acsdisplay("TARGETING SHIP - "..matches[3]..".") send("turret target ship "..shiptar) send("shipt Target acquired, sights locked on "..shiptar.."!")

Trigger.name: Target Module
Trigger.script: moduletar=matches[3] acsdisplay("TARGETING MODULE - "..moduletar..".") send("Turret target module "..moduletar) send("shipt Target acquired, sights locked on their "..moduletar.."!")

Trigger.name: Targeted Module Target
Trigger.script: if matches[3]== wm.name then moduletarget=string.upper(matches[4]) send("turret target module "..matches[4]) acsdisplay("TARGETING MODULE - <red>"..moduletarget) send("shipt My sights are locked on the "..moduletarget..", captain!") end

regexCodeList.string: \(Ship\)\: (\w+) says, "(\w+), set your sights on their (\w+)\!"

Trigger.name: Bombard
Trigger.script: if matches[3]== wm.name then send("shipt Bombard sequence initiated!") send("turret bombard") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You tune the weapon module to target .+ \[(\w+)\]\.$
^You tune the weapon module to target a six-headed (scyllus)\.$
^You tune the weapon module to target an? \w+ (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Turret_Auto
Trigger.script: for creature in pairs(wm.aether.turret.list) do send("turret target creature "..wm.aether.turret.list[creature]) end

regexCodeList.string: Drawn by the flux of energy,
The energy vortex flashes and a vortex karibidean flies out of it.
A battle turret is not targeting anything.

Trigger.name: Collector Exhaustion
Trigger.script: send("shipt I am suffering from exhaustion") send("siphon vortex")

regexCodeList.string: Exhaustion clouds your mind and you fail to properly link to an energy collector.

Trigger.name: AutoSiphon
Trigger.script: if wm.aether.count < wm.aether.thres then send("siphon vortex") end

regexCodeList.string: An energy collector whirrs quietly, ready to be used once again.

Trigger.name: Collector Off Targetted
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == wm.name then send("shipt My collector is deactivated") disableTrigger("collector_module") end

Trigger.name: Collector Off
Trigger.script: send("shipt My collector is deactivated") disableTrigger("collector_module")

regexCodeList.string: An energy collector is filled to capacity.

Trigger.name: Siphoning Vortex
Trigger.script: send("shipt Siphoned vortex. My collector is now at " ..matches[2].." energy.")

regexCodeList.string: ^You siphon some energy from the energy vortex into an energy collector, bringing it to a total of (\d+) energy\.$
There is no energy vortex to siphon energy from.

Trigger.name: Siphon Announce On
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Siphon_Announce") send("shipt I will now announce my siphon attempts")

Trigger.name: Siphon Announce Off
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Siphon_Announce") send("shipt I will not announce my siphon attempts")

shudders violently, then comes to a complete stop\.$
There is a barely perceptible shift as
^The floor shakes as \w+ fires a blast that slams into a
A battle turret is not targeting anything.
A battle turret is not yet ready to be used again.
You tune the weapon module to target
A battle turret whirrs quietly, ready to be used once again.
No such creature is close enough for a battle turret to get a targeting lock.
That module is already in full repair.
The empathic grid is not yet ready to be used again.
^.+ is unable to do that while docked\.$
Drawn by the flux of energy
enters from the \w+ on the aetherways.
There is a barely perceptible shift as
shudders violently, then comes to a complete stop\.$

Trigger.name: Turret On Targetted
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == wm.name then if wm.aether.module == "turret" then enableTrigger("turret_module") send("shipt My turret is now activated") else send("shipt I am not operating a turret") end end

Trigger.name: Turret On
Trigger.script: if wm.aether.module == "turret" then send("shipt My turret is now activated") enableTrigger("turret_module") end

Trigger.name: Collector On Targetted
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == wm.name then if wm.aether.module == "collector" then enableTrigger("collector_module") send("shipt My collector is activated") send("ship look") else send("shipt I am not operating a collector") end end

Trigger.name: Collector On
Trigger.script: if wm.aether.module == "collector" then send("shipt My collector is activated") enableTrigger("collector_module") send("ship look") end

Trigger.name: Siphon Announce On
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Siphon_Announce") send("Shipt I will now announce my siphon attempts")

Trigger.name: Siphon Announce Off
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Siphon_Announce") send("Shipt I will no longer announce my siphon attempts")

regexCodeList.string: ^Drawn by the flux of energy, an? \w+ \w+ suddenly wanders into the nearby area\.$
Drawn by the flux of energy, a six-headed scyllus suddenly wanders into the nearby area.
The energy vortex flashes and a vortex karibidean flies out of it.

Trigger.name: dead beast
Trigger.script: if wm.aether.count > 0 then wm.aether.count = wm.aether.count - 1 end wm.aether.beast = false send("ship look") cecho("beastCount", "<green>\nBeasts following: " ..wm.aether.count)

regexCodeList.string: You have slain an aetheretic slivven.
^An aetheretic slivven has been slain( by \w+)\.$
^You step up to \w+ (\w+ \w+), locking yourself into the module and linking your mind to the controls of the ship\. After a moment, you begin to sense your command of the module in your own brain\.$
^With a long, slow blink, you allow your mind to drift free from the ship, and release your lock on the command of \w+ (\w+ \w+)\.$

Timer.name: pilotSiphon_timer
Timer.script: if wm.count == 0 then send("shipt siphon") end

Alias.name: pilot steering
Alias.script: if shadowed then send("pilot maneuver "..matches[2]) else send("pilot steer " ..matches[2], false) end wm.aether.autopilot = false disableTrigger("Pilot_Auto")

Alias.name: gliding
Alias.script: if shadowed then send("pilot maneuver "..matches[2]) else send("pilot glide " ..matches[2], false) end

Alias.name: gotest
Alias.script: wm.aether.automove()

Alias.name: On
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Pilot_Auto") wm.aether.count = 0 wm.aether.move = "southwest" wm.aether.autopilot = true if PilotSiphon then enableTrigger("Pilot_Siphon") end wm.note("Autopiloter engaged. 'Beast here' is <red>" ..tostring(wm.aether.beast).. "<green>. 'In shockwave' set to <red>" ..tostring(wm.aether.shockwave))

Alias.name: Off
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Pilot_Auto") wm.aether.count = 0 wm.aether.move = "southwest" wm.aether.autopilot = false disableTrigger("Pilot_Siphon") wm.note("Autopiloter disengaged. 'Beast here' is <red>" ..tostring(wm.aether.beast).. "<green>. 'In shockwave' set to <red> " ..tostring(wm.aether.shockwave))

Alias.name: PilotSiphon
Alias.script: --Currently, This only works if you are using the autopiloter also if matches[2] == "on" then PilotSiphon = true enableTrigger("Pilot_Siphon") wm.note("Pilot Siphoning set to <red>" ..tostring(PilotSiphon).. "<green>. You will automatically call siphon when ontop of a vortex until a beast is summoned.") elseif matches[2] == "off" then PilotSiphon = false disableTrigger("Pilot_Siphon") wm.note("Pilot Siphoning set to <red>" ..tostring(PilotSiphon)) end

Alias.name: AutoFlight_Movement
Alias.script: if wm.aether.autopilot then wm.aether.automove() end

Alias.name: empathHealAll
Alias.script: wm.aether.gridheal()

Alias.name: slivvenCheck
Alias.script: enableTrigger("slivvenCheck") slivvenFound = 0 send("grid modules")

Alias.name: EmpathSetUp
Alias.script: enableTrigger("EmpathStartUp") wm.aether.empath.table = {chair = {},grid = {},collectors = {},orb = {},turrets = {},cube = {},} collCount = 0 turrCount = 0 send("grid modules")

Alias.name: clarity on death
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then triggerEnable("Clarity_on_death") else triggerDisable("Clarity_on_death") end

Alias.name: Clarity
Alias.script: send("grid clarity "..wm.aether.empath.table.chair[1])

Alias.name: gridbalanceon
Alias.script: enableTrigger("GridReady") wm.note("You have enabled grid repairing on balance. To disable type <red>gridbalanceoff<green>.")

Alias.name: gridbalanceoff
Alias.script: disableTrigger("GridReady") wm.note("You have disabled grid repairing on balance. To renable type <red>gridbalanceon<green>.")

Alias.name: Automatic Environment Capture
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Aether Environments") send("ship look")

Alias.name: Aetherenviro setter
Alias.script: wm.aether.turret.makeList(string.lower(matches[2]))

Alias.name: Turretcall enable
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Turret_Auto") enableTrigger("Turret_Caller") wm.note("Target acquisition by pilot command enabled") send("shipt Turret enabled. Target acquisition method: Calling")

Alias.name: Turretauto enable
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Turret_Caller") enableTrigger("Turret_Auto") wm.note("Automatic target acquisition enabled") tempTimer(1.5, [[wm.note("Environment parameter required")]]) tempTimer(2.5, [[wm.note("Set environment now (<yellow>eset <environment><white>) or upon arrival at hunting grounds (<yellow>ecapture<white>)")]]) tempTimer(4, [[send("shipt Turret enabled. Target acquisition method: Automatic")]]) tempTimer(4, [[send("turret fire")]])

Alias.name: Turretoff
Alias.script: disableTrigger("turret_module") send("shipt My turret is now deactivated")

Alias.name: Turreton
Alias.script: enableTrigger("turret_module") send("shipt My turret is activated")

Alias.name: siphonon
Alias.script: enableTrigger("collector_module") send("shipt My collector is activated")

Alias.name: siphonoff
Alias.script: disableTrigger("collector_module") send("shipt My collector is deactivated")

Alias.name: Beast Threshold
Alias.script: wm.aether.thres = tonumber(matches[2]) wm.note("Beast threshold set to <yellow>" ..wm.aether.thres) tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Automatic siphoning active while fewer than <yellow>"..wm.aether.thres.." <white>beasts in area")]]) tempTimer(1.5, [[send("shipt my siphoning threshold is set to " ..wm.aether.thres.." beasts")]]) tempTimer(1.5, [[send("ship look")]])

Alias.name: siphonauto enable
Alias.script: enableTrigger("collector_module") disableTrigger("CallSiphon") enableTrigger("AutoSiphon") wm.note("Automatic siphoning enabled ") tempTimer(.5, [[send("shipt automated siphoning enabled")]]) if wm.aether.thres then tempTimer(1.5, [[wm.note("Beast threshold set to "..wm.aether.thres.." (<yellow>thres <#><white>)")]]) tempTimer(2.5, [[wm.note("Automatic siphoning active while fewer than <yellow>"..wm.aether.thres.." <white>beasts in area ")]]) tempTimer(3, [[send("shipt my siphoning threshold is set to " ..wm.aether.thres.." beasts")]]) tempTimer(3, [[send("ship look")]]) else tempTimer(1.5, [[wm.note("Threshold paramater required")]]) tempTimer(2.5, [[wm.note("Automatically siphon until threshold is reached (<yellow>thres <#><white>)")]]) end wm.aether.count = 0

Alias.name: siphoncall enable
Alias.script: enableTrigger("collector_module") disableTrigger("AutoSiphon") enableTrigger("CallSiphon") wm.note("Siphon attempt by pilot command enabled ") tempTimer(1, [[send("shipt call-based siphoning enabled")]])

Alias.name: Siphon Announce
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Siphon_Announce") send("Shipt I will now announce my siphon attempts") wm.note("You will now announce your siphoning, to turn this off type <red>siphonsilent.")

Alias.name: Siphon Silent
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Siphon_Announce") send("Shipt I will not announce my siphon attempts") wm.note("vocal accompaniment for siphon attempts disabled <red>siphonannounce")

Alias.name: Huntoff
Alias.script: disableTrigger("AutoSiphon") disableTrigger("CallSiphon") disableTrigger("Turret_Caller") disableTrigger("Turret_Auto") disableTrigger("turret_module") disableAlias("turret_module") disableTrigger("collector_module") disableAlias("collector_module") disableTrigger("empath_module") disableAlias("empath_module") disableAlias("command_module") disableTrigger("command_module") disableTrigger("Aether_Gags") wm.aether.count = 0 wm.aether.module = nil wm.aether.thres = nil wm.note("All aetherhunt module functions disabled")

Alias.name: aetherbeastcount
Alias.script: wm.aether.count = tonumber(matches[2])

Alias.name: version
Alias.script: wm.note("You are running version " ..wm.aether.version.. " of Morbo's Aethercraft Module")

Alias.name: gag stuff
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "all" then enableTrigger("Turret_Gags") enableTrigger("Empath_Gags") enableTrigger("Beast_Gags") enableTrigger("Move_Gags") elseif matches[2] == "turret" then enableTrigger("Turret_Gags") elseif matches[2] == "empath" then enableTrigger("Empath_Gags") elseif matches[2] == "beast" then enableTrigger("Beast_Gags") elseif matches[2] == "move" then enableTrigger("Move_Gags") end local string = "" local comma = false if isActive("Turret_Gags","trigger") == 1 then string = string.."<red>turret" comma = true end if isActive("Empath_Gags","trigger") == 1 then if comma then string = string.."<green>, " comma = false end string = string.."<red>empath" comma = true end if isActive("Beast_Gags","trigger") == 1 then if comma then string = string.."<green>, " comma = false end string = string.."<red>beast" comma = true end if isActive("Move_Gags","trigger") == 1 then if comma then string = string.."<green>, " comma = false end string = string.."<red>move" comma = true end
wm.note("You are gagging "..string.."<green>. To ungag, you will need to <red>ungagall <green>or<red> ungag(module)")

Alias.name: ungag stuff
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "all" then disableTrigger("Turret_Gags") disableTrigger("Empath_Gags") disableTrigger("Beast_Gags") disableTrigger("Move_Gags") elseif matches[2] == "turret" then disableTrigger("Turret_Gags") elseif matches[2] == "empath" then disableTrigger("Empath_Gags") elseif matches[2] == "beast" then disableTrigger("Beast_Gags") elseif matches[2] == "move" then disableTrigger("Move_Gags") else wm.note("Invalid gag type. <green>Choices are <red>turret<green>, <red>empath<green>, <red>beast<green>, and <red>move<green>.", "red") end
local string = "" local comma = false if isActive("Turret_Gags","trigger") == 1 then string = string.."<red>turret" comma = true end if isActive("Empath_Gags","trigger") == 1 then if comma then string = string.."<green>, " comma = false end string = string.."<red>empath" comma = true end if isActive("Beast_Gags","trigger") == 1 then if comma then string = string.."<green>, " comma = false end string = string.."<red>beast" comma = true end if isActive("Move_Gags","trigger") == 1 then if comma then string = string.."<green>, " comma = false end string = string.."<red>move" comma = true end
wm.note("You are gagging "..string.."<green>. To gag other modules, you will need to <red>gagall <green>or<red> gag(module)")

Alias.name: catch all setup alias?
Alias.script: if not wm.aether.module then wm.note("No active module connection") tempTimer(.5, [[wm.note("Please run command again after locking in")]]) else wm.aether[wm.aether.module]["setup"]() end

Script.name: Variables
Script.script:
if not wm then wm = {} end if not wm.aether then wm.aether = {empath = {}, turret = {}, command = {}, collector = {},} end wm.aether.version = "3.0" wm.aether.beast = false wm.name = "Tulemrah" wm.aether.haveClarity = true
function wm.note(message, color) if not color then color = "white" end cecho("\n<yellow>(<white>Windmills<yellow>) <"..color..">"..message) end

Script.name: Auto Pilot
Script.script: function wm.aether.automove() if not wm.aether.shockwave and wm.aether.beast then if wm.aether.count > 0 then if wm.aether.move == "southwest" then send("pilot steer east") elseif wm.aether.move == "south" then send("pilot steer north") elseif wm.aether.move == "east" then send("pilot steer north") elseif wm.aether.move == "north" then send("pilot steer south") elseif wm.aether.move == "west" then send("pilot steer east") end elseif wm.count == 0 then if wm.aether.move == "southwest" then send("pilot steer west") elseif wm.aether.move == "south" then send("pilot steer west") elseif wm.aether.move == "east" then send("pilot steer west") elseif wm.aether.move == "north" then send("pilot steer southwest") elseif wm.aether.move == "west" then send("pilot steer west") end end end end

Script.name: Grid Heal
turret stuff
module lockin
Script.script:
function wm.aether.lockin(mod) if mod == "command chair" then mod = "command" wm.note("Connection to command module established") tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Is there a setup protocol? (<yellow>wm setup<white>)")]]) elseif mod == "empathic grid" then wm.note("Connection to empath module established") if wm.aether.module ~= "empath" then tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Please run setup protocol (<yellow>wm setup<white>)")]]) end mod = "empath" elseif mod == "battle turret" then wm.aether.turret = wm.aether.turret or {} wm.note("Connection to turret module established") if wm.aether.module ~= "turret" then tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Please run setup protocol (<yellow>wm setup<white>)")]]) end mod = "turret" elseif mod == "energy collector" then wm.note("Connection to collector module established") if wm.aether.module ~= "collector" then tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Wait until arrival at hunting grounds to run setup protocol (<yellow>wm setup<white>)")]]) end mod = "collector"
--When your captain is ready to begin siphoning type either <red>'siphoncall' <green>or <red>'siphonauto'") else wm.note("Connection to unknown module failed", "red") end wm.aether.module = module enableAlias(module.."_module") enableTrigger(module.."_module")
end

Script.name: target list
module unlock
Script.script:
function wm.aether.unlock(module)
if module == "command chair" then module = "command" wm.note("Connection to command module lost") elseif module == "empathic grid" then module = "empath" wm.note("Connection to empath module lost") elseif module == "battle turret" then wm.note("Connection to turret module lost") elseif module == "energy collector" then wm.note("Connection to collector module lost") else wm.note("Disengaged from unknown module") end tempTimer(1.5, [[wm.note("Please terminate all module functions on completion of hunt (<yellow>huntoff<white>)")]]) disableTrigger("Aether_Gags") disableAlias(module.."_module") disableTrigger(module.."_module") end

Script.name: DeleteLineP
Script.script: function deleteLineP() deleteLine() tempLineTrigger(1,1,[[ if string.find(line, "%dhull, .*") then deleteLine() end ]]) end

Script.name: setup scripts
Script.script:
function wm.aether.command.setup() wm.note("Running command module initialization") tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Script not completed")]]) end
function wm.aether.empath.setup() wm.note("Running empath module initialization (<yellow>gridsetup<white>)") tempTimer(.5, [[expandAlias("gridsetup", false)]]) tempTimer(1.5, [[wm.note("Checking for slivvens (<yellow>slvCheck<white>)")]]) tempTimer(2, [[expandAlias("slvCheck", false)]]) if isActive("GridReady","trigger") == 1 then tempTimer(3, [[wm.note("Autonomous grid healing enabled (<yellow>gridbalanceon<white>)")]]) else tempTimer(3, [[wm.note("Autonomous grid healing disabled (<yellow>gridbalanceoff<white>)")]]) end tempTimer(4.5, [[wm.note("Manual grid healing enabled (<yellow>rep<white>)")]]) end
function wm.aether.turret.setup() wm.note("Running turret module initialization") if isActive("Turret_Caller", "trigger") == 1 then tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Target acquisition by pilot command enabled (<yellow>turretcall<white>)")]]) end if isActive("Turret_Auto", "trigger") == 1 then tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Automatic target acquisition enabled (<yellow>turretauto<white>)")]]) end if isActive("Turret_Caller", "trigger") == 1 and isActive("Turret_Auto", "trigger") == 1 then tempTimer(1.5, [[wm.note("Conflicting target acquisition methods active, please rectify", "red")]]) end if isActive("Turret_Caller", "trigger") == 0 and isActive("Turret_Auto", "trigger") == 0 then tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Target acquition disabled (<yellow>turretcall<white>|<yellow>turretauto<white>)")]]) end end
function wm.aether.collector.setup() wm.note("Running collector module initialization") if isActive("Siphon_Announce", "trigger") == 1 then tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Vocal accompaniment for siphon attempts enabled (<yellow>siphonsilent<white>)")]]) else tempTimer(1, [[wm.note("Vocal accompaniment for siphon attempts disabled (<yellow>siphonannounce<white>) ")]]) end if isActive("CallSiphon", "trigger") == 1 and isActive("AutoSiphon", "trigger") == 1 then tempTimer(1.5, [[wm.note("Conflicting siphon methods active, please rectify", "red")]]) else if isActive("CallSiphon", "trigger") == 1 then tempTimer(2.5, [[wm.note("Siphon attempt by pilot command enabled")]]) end if isActive("AutoSiphon", "trigger") == 1 then tempTimer(2.5, [[expandAlias("siphonauto", false)]]) end if isActive("CallSiphon", "trigger") == 0 and isActive("AutoSiphon", "trigger") == 0 then tempTimer(2.5, [[wm.note("Active siphoning disabled (<yellow>siphoncall<white>|<yellow>siphonauto<white>)")]]) end end end
